original_text: Look up at the sky! Think about the one who made all the stars. God is the one who brought together that great army! He knows how many they are and he knows each of their names! When he calls them, each one is there, because he is so strong and powerful. Look up at the sky! Think about the one who made all the stars. God is the one who brought together that great army! He knows how many they are and he knows each of their names! When he calls them, each one is there, because he is so strong and powerful. Look up at the sky! Think about the one who made all the stars. God is the one who brought together that great army! He knows how many they are and he knows each of their names! When he calls them, each one is there, because he is so strong and powerful. Look up at the sky! Think about the one who made all the stars. God is the one who brought together that great army! He knows how many they are and he knows each of their names! When he calls them, each one is there, because he is so strong and powerful. Look up at the sky!
korean_text: 너희는 눈을 높이 들어 누가 이 모든 것을 창조하였나 보라 주께서는 수효대로 만상을 이끌어 내시고 그들의 모든 이름을 부르시나니 그의 권세가 크고 그의 능력이 강하므로 하나도 빠짐이 없느니라

sentences.original_text: Look up at the sky!
Think about the one who made all the stars.
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 별을 만드신 분에 대해 생각하라.

sentences.original_text: God is the one who brought together that great army!
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 그 큰 군대를 모으신 분이시다!

sentences.original_text: He knows how many they are
and he knows each of their names!
When he calls them, each one is there,
sentences.korean_translation: 그분이 그들을 부르시면, 각각 그곳에 있으며,

sentences.original_text: because he is so strong and powerful.
Look up at the sky!

sentences.original_text: God is the one who brought together that great army!
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 그 큰 군대를 모으신 분이시다!

sentences.original_text: He knows how many they are
and he knows each of their names!
When he calls them, each one is there,
sentences.korean_translation: 그분이 그들을 부르시면, 각각 그곳에 있으며,

sentences.original_text: because he is so strong and powerful.
Look up at the sky!
